tool_description: Generates inventory demand forecasts using historical data, seasonal patterns, and trend analysis to support procurement and stocking decisions.

forecast_horizon_days.description: Number of days to forecast ahead (7-365)

historical_data_days.description: Days of historical data to use for modeling (30-730)

external_factors.description: External factors to consider in forecasting

error_messages: Invalid forecast horizon: Must be between 7 and 365 days.
Invalid historical period: Must be between 30 and 730 days.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough data points for reliable forecasting.
Invalid confidence interval: Must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Product limit exceeded: Maximum 100 products can be forecasted at once.
Forecasting model error: Unable to generate reliable forecast with available data.
usage: Provide product_ids and forecast_horizon_days for basic forecasting. Adjust historical_data_days for model depth. Enable seasonality_detection for seasonal products. Include external_factors for enhanced accuracy.
